SEARCH
Module HMSApp
Package controller

Class RecordsController

java.lang.Object
controller.RecordsController
public class RecordsController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing and handling various records (Medical, Appointment, Payment) in the system. This class provides functionality to generate record IDs, add, update, delete, and retrieve records from the repository.

  • Method Details

    • generateRecordID

      public static String generateRecordID(RecordFileType recType)
      Generates a unique record ID based on the record type.
      Parameters:
      recType - the type of record (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      Returns:
      a unique record ID as a string

    • checkRecordsDuplication

      public Boolean checkRecordsDuplication(String UID, RecordFileType recType)
      Checks if a record of the specified type already exists for a given UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the unique identifier of the record
      recType - the type of record to check (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      Returns:
      true if a record exists for the given UID, otherwise false

    • addMedicalRecord

      public void addMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord mr)
      Adds a new medical record to the repository.
      Parameters:
      mr - the MedicalRecord object to be added

    • updateRecord

      public Boolean updateRecord(String recordID, RecordFileType recType, String status, String doctorID, String patientID, LocalDateTime updatedDate)
      Updates an existing record based on the record type and provided details.
      Parameters:
      recordID - the ID of the record to be updated
      recType - the type of record (Appointment, Payment, or Medical)
      status - the status to be set for the record
      doctorID - the doctor ID to be set for the record
      patientID - the patient ID to be set for the record
      updatedDate - the date and time when the record was updated
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully updated, otherwise false

    • deleteRecord

      public Boolean deleteRecord(String recordID)
      Deletes a record based on the record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordID - the ID of the record to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully deleted, otherwise false

    • getMedicalRecordsByPatientID

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecordsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a medical record by the patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose medical record is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the medical record for the given patient ID, or null if not found

    • getMedicalRecordsByDoctorID

      public ArrayList<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecordsByDoctorID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a list of medical records by the doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor whose medical records are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of medical records for the given doctor ID

      Returns:
      the medical record corresponding to the given record ID, or null if not found

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecordByPatientId

      public static ArrayList<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getAppointmentOutcomeRecordByPatientId(String patientID)
      Retrieves a list of appointment outcome records for a given patient ID. This method retrieves all appointment outcome records related to the patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose appointment outcome records are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects associated with the given patient ID, or an empty list if no records are found
